title: Pak-Estonia BPC reviews bilateral cooperation
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 10 (APP): The fourth round of Bilateral Political Consultations (BPC) between Pakistan and the Republic of Estonia held here Wednesday undertook a comprehensive review of bilateral cooperation in diverse areas.
Additional Foreign Secretary (Europe) Ambassador Shafqat Ali Khan led the Pakistani side while Director General of the Department of Asia, the Pacific, Middle East, and Africa, Kristi Karelsohn, headed the Estonian side, a post on X said.
The two sides discussed regional and global developments of mutual concern.
